fields.label: Select sidebar
fields.name: gg_select_sidebar
fields.instructions: Select a sidebar. You can create unlimited sidebars in Appearance >> Theme options.

fields.label: Size guide
fields.name: gg_product_size_guide
fields.instructions: Show a size guide button on the product page

fields.label: Button name
fields.name: gg_product_size_guide_name
fields.instructions: Insert the button name. E.G.: View size guide

fields.label: Style/function
fields.name: gg_product_size_guide_style
fields.instructions: Choose how to display the size guide.

fields.label: Display image logo
fields.name: gg_display_image_logo
fields.instructions: Display an image logo instead of the title.

fields.label: Logo image retina
fields.name: gg_logo_image_retina
fields.instructions: Upload the retina version of the logo.

fields.label: Logo margins
fields.name: gg_logo_margins
fields.instructions: Insert the logo margins, if necessary. Eg: 5px 0 0 2px

fields.label: Display wp admin image logo
fields.name: gg_display_admin_image_logo
fields.instructions: Display a custom image/logo on the wp admin login area.

fields.label: Display footer image logo
fields.name: gg_display_footer_image_logo
fields.instructions: Display an image logo in the footer

fields.label: Footer logo image retina
fields.name: gg_footer_logo_image_retina
fields.instructions: Upload the retina version of the logo.

fields.label: Footer logo margins
fields.name: gg_footer_logo_margins
fields.instructions: Insert the logo margins, if necessary. Eg: 5px 0 0 2px

fields.label: Display tagline
fields.name: gg_display_tagline
fields.instructions: Display the tagline. You can set/change it in Settings >> General.

choices.style_1: With logo on the left side

fields.label: Social icons
fields.name: gg_social_icons
fields.instructions: These icons are displayed with the help of "Social Icons Widget"

fields.label: Sidebar options
fields.name: gg_sidebars
fields.instructions: Create a custom sidebar to use on pages or posts. Then go to Appearance >> Widgets to add widgets.

fields.label: Headings font
fields.name: gg_headings_font
fields.instructions: Select the theme font. Default: Oswald

fields.label: Body font
fields.name: gg_body_font
fields.instructions: Select the theme font. Default: Lato

fields.label: Elements color
fields.message:
Modify the default elements color. 
Affects: elements with background color, like footer, badges, dark menu, fullscreen search

fields.label: Search page
fields.message: Select the layout of the search page.

fields.label: 404 page
fields.message: Set the options for the 404 error page.

fields.label: Error page description
fields.name: gg_error_page_description
fields.default_value: It seems we can't find what you're looking for. Perhaps searching can help.

fields.label: Category/Archive page
fields.message: Select the layout of the posts category/archive page.

fields.label: CSS
fields.name: gg_css
fields.instructions: Your custom CSS goes here. Do not include the style tag. This is already done for you.

fields.label: JS
fields.name: gg_script
fields.instructions: Add custom footer scripts such as Google Analytics. Do not include the script tag. This is already done for you.

fields.label: Catalog mode
fields.name: gg_store_catalog_mode
fields.instructions: Enable/Disable catalog mode. This will disable: add to cart, checkout and buy functions.

fields.label: Activate product image sizes
fields.name: gg_activate_product_image_sizes
fields.instructions: Check this to activate the inputs for image size change from WooCommerce >> Settings >> Products >> Display

fields.label: Shop columns
fields.name: gg_shop_product_columns
fields.instructions: Select the shop page number of columns

fields.label: Products per page
fields.name: gg_product_per_page
fields.instructions: Insert the number of products to display until pagination kicks is

fields.label: Product image zoom
fields.name: gg_product_image_zoom
fields.instructions: Enable/disable the zoom feature on product

fields.label: Product add to cart button
fields.name: gg_product_add_to_cart
fields.instructions: Enable/Disable product add to cart button

fields.label: Number of posts to show
fields.name: gg_blog_no_of_posts_to_show
fields.instructions: Insert the number of blog posts to show

fields.label: Gallery item click
fields.name: gg_select_gallery_open_type
fields.instructions: Select what to open when you click on the gallery item.

choices.separate_page: Gallery item content in an separate page

fields.label: Gallery item lightbox image
fields.name: gg_gallery_item_lightbox_image
fields.instructions: Upload the image used in lightbox.

fields.label: Gallery item lightbox video
fields.name: gg_gallery_item_lightbox_video
fields.instructions: Insert the video link (Vimeo or Youtube)

fields.label: Custom URL
fields.name: gg_gallery_item_custom_url
fields.instructions: Insert a custom URL here. The gallery item will link to this URL instead of the default one (the one that sends you to the gallery details page)

fields.label: Gallery images
fields.name: gg_gallery_images
fields.instructions: Upload the images used gallery item page.

fields.label: Number of posts to show
fields.name: gg_gallery_no_of_posts_to_show
fields.instructions: Insert the number of gallery posts to show

fields.label: Page description
fields.name: gg_page_description
fields.instructions: Insert your page short description here.

fields.label: Header slideshow info
fields.message: You can display a Revolution Slider in the theme header, under the menu.

fields.label: Overwrite header style on page
fields.name: gg_overwrite_header_style_on_page
fields.instructions: Overwrite the header style set in the theme options only on this specific page.

choices.style_1: With logo on the left side

fields.label: Addresses
fields.name: gg_contact_addresses
fields.instructions: If your clinic has more addresses you can add them here.

sub_fields.label: Latitude
sub_fields.name: gg_contact_map_latitude
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter the latitude value of your location in this format 51.13456
Latitude value is the first string (before comma) of google map address. E.G.: 51.13456, -1.34333

sub_fields.label: Longitude
sub_fields.name: gg_contact_map_longitude
sub_fields.instructions:
Enter the longitude value of your location in this format -1.34333
Latitude value is the second string (after comma) of google map address. E.G.: 51.13456, -1.34333

sub_fields.label: InfoWindow
sub_fields.name: gg_contact_map_infowindow
sub_fields.instructions: Insert your address details. Will appear after you click on the marker icon.

fields.label: Email address
fields.name: gg_contact_page_email
fields.instructions: Enter your email address. On this address you will receive the emails from this contact form. If the email is not set it defaults to the admin email from Settings >> General.

fields.label: From: Email address
fields.name: gg_contact_page_email_from
fields.instructions: Enter the FROM email address. E.G.: noreply@yoursitename.com

fields.label: Success text
fields.name: gg_contact_page_success_msg
fields.instructions: Enter the success message that will be displayed on successful email delivery.

fields.label: Error text
fields.name: gg_contact_page_error_msg
fields.instructions: Enter the error message that will be displayed on  email delivery failure.
fields.default_value: There was an error submitting the form.
